license.remedy: The specified license abbreviation is not listed as approved in the license database.  The license database is specified in the rpminspect configuration file.  Check this file and send a pull request to the appropriate upstream project to update the database.  If the license is listed in the database but marked unapproved, you may need to work with the legal team regarding options for this software.
